description:
This course provides a complete step-by-step strategy for creating webinars that convert and also provide a great educational experience for the participants.

The Webinar Selling System includes videos, downloadable PDFs of each module and additional material to support the student as they create their own successful webinar.

This course will take approximately 2-3 hours to complete.

This course is structured in a step-by-step format. The content is delivered in a very linear format so that anybody can go through the course and implement the training.

When done right, webinars are one of THE most powerful tools for selling your products & services while also developing a bond with your prospective students and clients resulting in incredible word-of-mouth marketing.

If you are a coach, consultant, author, trainer, realtor or anybody who has knowledge to share and a product or service to sell then creating effective webinars is a must-have tool to add to your marketing mix.

In fact, webinars have been the #1 way that I've converted hot, warm and even cold leads into paying clients taking my business into 6-figures per year.

Whether you take the Webinar Selling System course or not, I highly recommend that you learn how to create and deliver amazing webinars.
title: The Webinar Selling System
